input.sentences: macro photography is fun | so we started with mushrooms .
then tried a closeup on bark .
of course | we had to take photographs of flowers .
and also things that look indescribably strange up close .
output.sentences: I've just started doing nature photography. Look at this mushroom.
I took this closeup of a trees bark.
I really like photographing flowers, though.
Insects are fun as well because of their colours and patterns.
Somethings I've photographed are entirely undescribeable.
